name: NeuroQuantology : SCOPUS Indexed-Call for Submissions
content: Welcome to NeuroQuantology NeuroQuantology proud to play an integral part within the academic community and to participate in the advancement of quantum neurobiology. By delivering high quality research information and innovative tools, we continue to refine our portfolio to serve the research needs. Contributions from academician, research scholars, research centers, industries and other institutions are solicited. This call for papers solicits original research, reviews and case studies that is highly informative for the Scientific community. Submissions at: https://www.neuroquantology.com/index.php/journal/author/submit/1 Internationally high impact titles with unmatched publication quality at one click............................ Submissions due: February 12, 2019 External Databases & Indexes Thomson Reuters Impact Factor: 0.586 H Index: 15 • Scopus • Science Citation Index • ISI Web of Science • Neuroscience Citation Index • Cabell's Directory • ProQuest • CrossRef • EBSCO Publishing • DOAJ • Index Copernicus • This journal utilizes the LOCKSS system • GALE CENGAGE Learning Editor-In-Chief, Founder Prof. Sultan Tarlacı | Dept of Neurology and Psychology, Prof., M.D., PhD., Turkey To discuss potential submissions, please contact NQ Managing Editor at editor@neuroquantology.com.
